column1: A veteran of World War II and Korea
column2: he served in the European Theater
column3: landing in Normandy on D-Day plus 4
column4: and traveled across Europe to the Elbe River in Germany.  Commissioned in the Ohio National Guard in 1946
column5: he was called to active duty in 1952 with the 37th Infantry Division and services in Korea as photo officer for the U.S. Military Advisory Group to the Korean Army.  During this service he was awarded the Ohio Commendation Medal for meritorious services.
